name: agentpayykit
description: Universal wallet infrastructure for the API economy

scripts.test:all: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:sdk && npm run test:gateway && npm run test:cli && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:sdk: npm run test --workspace=sdk/typescript && npm run test --workspace=packages/core && npm run test --workspace=packages/consumer-sdk && npm run test --workspace=packages/paywall-sdk
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:contracts && npm run test:integration:sdk && npm run test:integration:gateway
scripts.test:integration:contracts: cd tests/integration && npx vitest run contract-sdk
scripts.test:integration:sdk: cd tests/integration && npx vitest run sdk-gateway
scripts.test:integration:gateway: cd tests/integration && npx vitest run full-stack
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:workflows && npm run test:e2e:multichain
scripts.test:e2e:workflows: cd tests/e2e && npx playwright test workflows
scripts.test:e2e:multichain: cd tests/e2e && npx playwright test multichain
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:all && npm run coverage:report
scripts.test:multichain:local: anvil --fork-url https://mainnet.base.org & npm run test:contracts && kill %1
scripts.ci: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test:all
scripts.ci:quick: npm run type-check && npm run test:contracts
